summary: MY CARS BRAKE PEDAL  SUDDENLY BECAME STIFF AND WOULD NOT STOP MY CAR. I HAD TO SWERVE TO PREVENT MYSELF FROM REAR ENDING THE VEHICLE IN FRONT OF ME. AT THE NEXT STOP LIGHT I WAS EXTREMELY CAUTIOUS AND AFTER I FINALLY STOPPED, AS I WAITED FOR THE GREEN LIGHT THE CAR BEGAN IDLING ODDLY THEN IT STALLED. WAS ABLE TO START IT BACK UP. IT SEEMS TO BE SHIFTING A LITTLE ODDLY TOO. VERY SCARY DRIVING MY CAR. INCREDIBLY LUCKY WE WEREN'T INJURED NOR WAS ANYONE ELSE. WILL HAVE IT TOWED TO THE SHOP TO BE SAFE.
